attributes.action: Make E scooters legal on bike lanes
attributes.additional_details:
As it will make the planet more green 
And safe. More better London
attributes.background:
As e scooters are illegal 
And they are more efficient to the country 
Why can’t we have a limit on speed then allow them to go in bike lnes.  Already London have scooter trials. But why can’t we take our own scooters. To the roads.  
Helps climate change 
Pollution 
And emissions

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Legalize the use of e-scooters where bikes can be used: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583107

Allow E-scooters and Electric Skateboards in cycle lanes and on roads: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/578486
